root: ^Bs: I was wrong... you are still not ready after all.
^Bs: And that poor child got draged into this becouse of you...
^Bs: The sunrise is near. I'll give you one last command.
^Bs: Take this child back to his home and don't let anyone see you.
^The string that cpnnected you with Mars becomes visible again and Big Shadow breaks it appart with a strong move.
^Just as the string is disapearing, your eyes feel heavy and you start to lose conciousness.

c-0: ^You close your eyes without opposing to it.
c-1: ^You try to resist it with all your strengh.
^But it's useless, you feel too weak and, finally, your eyes close.

cont:
^You fall asleep.


^Mars picks you up from the floor and bows before leaving.


^She goes through the forest, quickly as the wind. Soon you're back in the town.

^No one around. Everything is quiet.

^Mars finds your home thanks to a spell Big Shadow casted.

^Mars: Here we are...

^She uses her magic boxes to climb to your window and leaves you in the bed.

^Mars: I was really dumb, wasn't I?

^Mars: Thinking that maybe I could trust you, that we could find Terry and have a good ending...

^Mars: So dumb...

^She gives you a final glance before jumping through the window and disapearing. Forever gone.


^Mom: Soul? Soul, how long do you pretend to sleep today?

^Mom: Come on, you can't be too exausted, Ms. Damant brough you after you fall asleep in the stree!

^Soul: ??

^You open your eyes, feeling weird. Your head hurts and you can't remember anything after Ms. Damant came to get you the night before.

^Mom: Good Morning little one!

^Mom: Did you have fun yesterday?

^You feel confused. No matter how hard you try, no memories come to you.

^You shrug, it couldn't have been too fun if you can't remember it.

^Mom: Oh, is that so?

^Mom: Well, let's go to the kitchen, your breakfast is ready! You can tell me more while you eat it.

^You agreed very hapy. Breakfast is great after all! You leave your room empty, with nothing especial.

^Just the candy you got the night before, but it was the same as last year. Candy corn, lolly pops... nothing special.


^The End.

end
